text: got it, thanks
There was some discussion about adding this. Once we finish the hubdb v2 rollout we will be free to add new UI/UX improvements
v2? O_o

It’s been suggested  many times before, but it’d be really nice if there was a hubDB link in the design manager. (Personally I think it’s kind of funny that currently the marketers have easier access to the hubDBs than developers(you can get to hubDB through the website pages screen))
Not sure if you have the new nav or not, but it's much more accessible on there

Someone just a fan of Google spreadsheets?

is the HubDB v2 coming with  dynamic CRUD (Create Read Update Delete) functionality from interface/code ? for example to be able to store info about a custom form submission to your own HubDB ?

I see so it’s just being rolled out. progressively, no need to opt in
It was actually a lot less work. I guess no one likes to live dangerously. :slightly_smiling_face:
